source: MAG 116 - The Show Must Go On-converted.pdf
title: MAG 116 - The Show Must Go On-converted
text:
gnus Archives – MAG116 – The Show Must Go On 
 
21 
 
ARCHIVIST 
Do I need to be worried about you? 
 
TIM 
You reading my mind again, boss? 
 
ARCHIVIST 
I’m watching your face. Do you— Are you going to keep it together? 
 
TIM 
Look, if you’re worried I’m going to go all Redrum and start hacking at random 
waxworks, don’t be. I’m not going to give us away. I want this to work. 
 
ARCHIVIST 
Thank you. 
 
TIM 
But I don’t think it will. So, I’m going to take that axe of yours and, when it all 
goes wrong, I’m going down swinging. And when I do, you’d better take the 
chance and stay out of my way. 
 
ARCHIVIST 
(Sighing) Okay, just... Okay. 
 
(Click) 
[The Magnus Archives Theme - Outro] 
 

The Magnus Archives – MAG116 – The Show Must Go On 
 
22 
 
The Magnus Archives is a podcast distributed by Rusty Quill and licensed under 
a Creative Commons Attribution Non-Commercial Sharealike 4.0 International 
licence. 
 
Today’s episode was written by Jonathan Sims and directed by Alexander J 
Newall. 
 
It featured: Jonathan Sims as the Archivist, Sue Sims as Gertrude Robinson, 
Alexander J Newall as Martin Blackwood, Ben Meredith as Elias Bouchard, 
Mike LeBeau as Tim Stoker, Frank Voss as Basira Hussain and Fay Roberts as 
Alice ‘Daisy’ Tonner.
